lead_paragraph: Patric Hornqvist makes a living by working in tight spaces. Given a rare moment of freedom from his usual spot parked in front of the opponent's net, the Pittsburgh Penguins forward pushed the Washington Capitals to the brink of elimination.

headline.print_headline: Hornqvist Scores in OT, Penguins Beat Capitals 3-2
headline.main: Hornqvist Scores in OT, Penguins Beat Capitals 3-2
